snippet.title: Furi - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Fight your way free in Furi, our frenzied boss fight game.
Available now on PlayStation 4, PC and Xbox One!
Get it here: http://www.FuriGame.com/

Trailer music by The Toxic Avenger http://www.thetoxicavenger.tv/
- - -
You were captured. Look what they’ve done to you… The jailer is the key, kill him and you’ll be free.
Fight your way free in this ultra-responsive, fast-paced sword fighting and dual-stick shooting game.
The all-boss combat-action with boss design by Takashi Okazaki, rocks to the powerful sounds of Carpenter Brut, Danger, The Toxic Avenger, Lorn and more!

Twitter: @theGameBakers
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/thegamebakers
